description.zh-CN: 复古科幻风格，融合维多利亚时代美学和蒸汽动力机械。采用黄铜元素、齿轮和机械复杂感创造奇幻氛围。复古科幻风格融合维多利亚美学与蒸汽动力机制。融合机械复杂和复古未来。
description.en-US: Retro sci-fi style combining Victorian era aesthetics with steam-powered machinery and brass elements Creates industrial-romantic visuals through gears, rivets, and ornate metal textures blended with modern functionality for distinctive industrial-romantic interfaces Perfect for gaming, fantasy applications, and industrial-romantic experiences Combines Victorian elegance with mechanical, brass-filled industrial aesthetics This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. mechanical intricacy and retro-futuristic imagination. Excellence in design.
